Subject: Abandoning the embassy
Message-ID: <8ohsjq+lvab@...>

Vulois turned to Child and Windrazor.

"I have been thinking. With all my worry about HeraldAngel's true 
purpose, The Alliance's cruel beating and murder of Soundwave, and 
the fact that the Predacons and Maximals have not responded to any of 
our calls yet, I am afraid of an attack on the embassy. We have 
already had one, but I'm thinking n the colossal scale, which none of 
us could survive. That's why I have decided to abandon the embassy. 
We are going to move everything to my old mountain lair. We take all 
the technology, and it's only a bit north from here. But it's inside 
the mountain. The trail is trecherous, and it will be virtually 
impossible to attack. We will leave the empty shell of the embassy 
for any group that wants a base. Both of you, go and tell the Peace 
Angels of our move, and get your things together. Than we can start 
taking apart the technology. We should leave by next week. When we 
arrive their Child, you will be trained. I know you want it now, but 
what would be the point if we were killed before it was finished. And 
you will still see your mother, not to worry. Now go! I will join you 
in a moment.

Vulois opened a comm to Battera and Cybershark.

"Battera, Cybershark, it's Vulois. Just to let you know that we're 
abandoning the embassy. We are going back to the mountain base. 
Whenever you are ready to come back, go there. Battera, you know the 
path from the old days, but becareful, it is still trecherous. And 
Cyberhsark, since you have not been there, Comm us and we'll come get 
you. Over and out!"

Vulois went inside to start taking the main computer boarsd out.
